doc.field: C G f0412reute u f BC-CARGILL-U.K.-STRIKE-T 03-25 0060
CARGILL U.K. STRIKE TALKS TO RESUME THIS AFTERNOON

Talks between Cargill U.K. Ltd's management and unions, aimed at ending the prolonged strike at its Seaforth oilseed processing plant, will resume this afternoon, a company spokesman said. Yesterday's session failed to reach a compromise but some progress was made, he said. REUTER
